name: sharespace
description: A modern AWS-hosted media sharing web application

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install -w frontend && npm install -w backend && npm install -w infrastructure
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w infrastructure
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w frontend && npm run type-check -w backend && npm run type-check -w infrastructure
scripts.deploy: npm run build -w infrastructure && cdk deploy --cwd infrastructure
